text: Uma ukuhwebelana kwembulunga yonke kwezomnotho kungenakugwema, kufanele ikakhulukazi kusebenzele isintu kunezintshisekelo zezinkampani zamazwe ngamazwe.
Ngangihlale ngeseka izwe lami, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi lalilungile noma alilungile.
Akekho okhetha izwe azalelwa kulo, ngakho kuwubuwula ukuziqhenya ngalo.
Umjaho wethu unezimfanelo eziningi ezinhle kakhulu uma uqhathaniswa nezinye izinhlanga.
Isitha sesitha sami umngane wami.
Isenzo sezempi esidelela umthetho wamazwe ngamazwe ngezinye izikhathi siyathethelelwa.
Manje sekunokuhlangana okukhathazayo kolwazi nokuzijabulisa.
Ekugcineni abantu bahlukaniswa kakhulu ngokwezigaba kunobuzwe.
Ukulawula ukwehla kwamandla emali kubaluleke kakhulu kunokulawula ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi.
Ngenxa yokuthi izinkampani azikwazi ukwethenjwa ukuthi zivikele imvelo ngokuzithandela, zidinga ukulawulwa.
“kulowo nalowo ngokwamandla akhe, kube yilowo nalowo ngokwesidingo sakhe” kuwumqondo omuhle ngokuyisisekelo.
Lapho imakethe ikhululeka, abantu bayakhululeka.
Kungumfanekiso odabukisayo emphakathini wethu ukuthi into eyisisekelo njengamanzi okuphuza manje isiwumkhiqizo wamabhodlela, oshibhile.
Umhlaba akufanele ube yimpahla okufanele ithengwe futhi idayiswe.
Kuyadabukisa ukuthi izinhlanhla eziningi zomuntu siqu zenziwa abantu abavele baxhaphaze imali futhi bangafaki lutho emphakathini wabo.
Ukuvikela ngezinye izikhathi kuyadingeka ekuhwebeni.
Ukuphela kwesibopho somphakathi senkampani kufanele kube ukuletha inzuzo kubanikazi bamasheya bayo.
Abacebile bakhokhiswa intela ephezulu kakhulu.
Labo abanekhono lokukhokha kufanele bathole ukufinyelela emazingeni aphezulu okunakekelwa kwezempilo.
Ohulumeni kufanele bajezise amabhizinisi adukisa umphakathi.
Imakethe yangempela yamahhala idinga imikhawulo ekhonweni lezidlakela zamazwe ngamazwe ukudala ama-monopolies.
Ukukhipha isisu, lapho ukuphila kowesifazane kungasongelwa, kufanele kuhlale kungekho emthethweni.
Wonke amagunya kufanele abuzwe.
Iso ngeso nezinyo ngezinyo.
Abakhokhintela akufanele balindelwe ukuthi basekele noma yiziphi izinkundla zemidlalo yaseshashalazini noma iminyuziyamu engakwazi ukuphila ngokuthengisa.
Izikole akufanele zenze ukuya ekilasini kube impoqo.
Bonke abantu banamalungelo abo, kodwa kungcono kithi sonke ukuthi izinhlobo ezahlukene zabantu zigcine uhlobo lwazo.
Abazali abalungile ngezinye izikhathi kudingeka bashaye izingane zabo.
Kungokwemvelo ukuba izingane zigcine izimfihlo ezithile kubazali bazo.
Ukuba nensangu ukuze uzisebenzisele yona akumele kube yicala lobugebengu.
Umsebenzi oyinhloko wesikole kufanele kube ukuhlomisa isizukulwane esizayo ukuthola imisebenzi.
Abantu abanokukhubazeka okukhulu okuzuzwa njengefa akufanele bavunyelwe ukuba bazalane.
Okubaluleke kakhulu ukuba izingane zifunde ukwamukela isiyalo.
Abekho abantu abanonya futhi abaphucuzekile; kukhona amasiko ahlukene kuphela.
Labo abakwaziyo ukusebenza, futhi benqaba ithuba, akufanele balindele ukwesekwa ngumphakathi.
Uma ukhathazekile, kungcono ukungacabangi ngakho, kodwa uhlale umatasa ngezinto ezijabulisa kakhulu.
Abokufika besizukulwane sokuqala abakwazi ukuhlanganiswa ngokugcwele ezweni labo elisha.
Okuhle ezinkampanini eziphumelela kakhulu kuhlezi, ekugcineni, kukuhle kithi sonke.
Asikho isikhungo sokusakaza, nakuba sizimele ngokuqukethwe kwaso, okufanele sithole uxhaso lukahulumeni.
Inkululeko yethu yomphakathi ivinjelwa ngokweqile egameni lokulwa nobuphekula.
Inzuzo enkulu yombuso weqembu elilodwa ukuthi igwema zonke izimpikiswano ezibambezela inqubekelaphambili ohlelweni lwezepolitiki lwentando yeningi.
Nakuba iminyaka ye-elekthronikhi yenza ukugada okusemthethweni kube lula, abenzi bokubi kuphela abadinga ukukhathazeka.
Isigwebo sentambo kufanele kube inketho emacaleni abucayi kakhulu.
Emphakathini ophucuzekile, umuntu kumele ahlale enabantu abangaphezulu okumele balalelwe kanye nabantu abangaphansi okumele bayalwe.
Ubuciko obungabonakali obungamele lutho akufanele buthathwe njengobuciko nhlobo.
Ebulungiswa bobugebengu, ukujezisa kufanele kubaluleke kakhulu kunokubuyisela esimweni.
Kuwukumosha isikhathi ukuzama ukuhlunyeleliswa izimilo ezinye zezigebengu.
Usomabhizinisi kanye nomkhiqizi babaluleke kakhulu kunombhali nomdwebi.
Omama bangase babe nemisebenzi ethile, kodwa umsebenzi wabo wokuqala uwukuba abakhaya.
Izinkampani zamazwe ngamazwe zixhaphaza ngokungafanele imithombo yofuzo yezitshalo zamazwe asathuthuka.
Ukwenza ukuthula nesikhungo kuyisici esibalulekile sokuvuthwa.
Ukubhula ngezinkanyezi kuzichaza ngokunembile izinto eziningi.
Awukwazi ukuziphatha kahle ngaphandle kokuba nenkolo.
Isisa singcono kunezokuphepha komphakathi njengendlela yokusiza abantu ababencishwe amathuba ngokweqiniso.
Abanye abantu banebhadi ngokwemvelo.
Kubalulekile ukuthi isikole somntanami sigxilise izindinganiso zenkolo.
Ubulili ngaphandle komshado ngokuvamile kuwukuziphatha okubi.
Umbhangqwana wobulili obufanayo ebudlelwaneni obuzinzile, obunothando akufanele ukhishwe ekutholeni ingane.
Izithombe zocansi, ezibonisa abantu abadala abavumayo, kufanele zibe semthethweni kubantu abadala.
Okwenzeka ekamelweni elizimele phakathi kwabantu abadala abavumayo akuyona ibhizinisi lombuso.
Akekho ongazizwa ngokwemvelo engungqingili.
Kulezi zinsuku ukuphumela obala ngocansi sekwedlulele.
